trends: There have been 17 other sightings in Frisco
There were no other sightings in Frisco on or around May 19th 2012
Summary: Round, glowing ball of fire around 3000 ft in elevation
divs: Sighting DetailsRound, glowing ball of reddish-orange with a halo around that traveled in a southeasterly to northwesterly direction. It did not pulsate its colors but had a halo of light around it. It stayed at the same elevation of around 3000 feet and flew its course at a very rapid speed. We watched it until it disappeared in the distance.
